sample.created: A new Sample is created with identifier {{ param }}
sample.updated: A Sample is updated with identifier {{ param }}
sample.deleted: A Sample is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Sample {{ id }}?

importPlate.title: Import Plate information
importPlate.select-file: Choose the file you would like to import with the format: Excel or CSV
importPlate.noSelectedFormat: Please specify the format you are importing.
importPlate.noFileSelected: Please select the data file to be imported.
importPlate.noContent: The data file should have at least one row.
importPlate.headersNotMapped: One or more of the file headers is not mapped. Please finish the mapping and try again.
importPlate.recordHasNoSampleId: One or more of the records do not include a Sample ID. Please check the file and try again.
importPlate.success: Sample Plate Information has been imported successfully.
importPlate.error: Something went wrong, please try again.

delete-entries.confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected entries from the list?

genotypes.study.label: Genotyping Study:
genotypes.run.label: Run:
genotypes.markers.select.study.description: Select the Genotyping Project and Run where the genotyping data will be coming from.
genotypes.markers.map.description: Select the markers that you want to import and map them to an ontology variable where the value will be stored. You can only select and import up to 10 markers.
genotypes.loading.markers: Loading the markers list. Please wait.
genotypes.variable.already.mapped.to.a.marker.erro: Variable "{{param1}}" is already mapped to the "{{param2}}" marker.
genotypes.selected.study.summary.description: This Genotyping Study contains {{param1}} Individuals and {{param2}} Markers.
genotypes.database.marker.count.exceeds.limit: The selected Genotyping Study contains more than {{param1}} markers. The application can only import data from a Genotyping Study with less than {{param1}} markers.
genotypes.import.error: Something went wrong, please try again.
